name: metrics_ipecho
description: Metrics snapshot for the ipecho tile

current_shred_version.description: The current shred version used by the validator

connection_count.description: The number of active connections to the ipecho service

connections_closed_ok.description: The number of connections to the ipecho service that have been made and closed normally

connections_closed_error.description: The number of connections to the ipecho service that have been made and closed abnormally

bytes_read.description: The total number of bytes read from all connections to the ipecho service

bytes_written.description: The total number of bytes written to all connections to the ipecho service
